summary:
Program Test Manager with13 years of experience in the IT industry, primarily in testing and business analysis within banking and financial services. I am SAFe certified and have extensive knowledge of agile methodologies, DevOps, and Cloud Migration. 

6 years of detailed UK payments processing experience for one of the UK's leading retail and commercial banks, involving payments processing engines, gateways, and channels. Specialist in functional testing of payment systems, delivering high-quality solutions for diverse and complex projects.

I have managed to deliver UK Compliance Programs, multi year Bank Migration projects, Critical Banking Upgrade projects, Enhancement/Upgrade projects, Modernisation/Simplification Programmes, Cloud Migration and Resilience projects, in diverse/multiple stakeholder environment. I have also led the cloud migration of clearing services, enabling the bank to achieve its strategic goals and enhance its operational resilience. 

Strong Client Interacting skills, Business Analysis, Stakeholder Management, Resource Management, Risk Management, Documentation and Presenting skills.

Passionate about driving innovation and excellence in the customer experience.
